typeSystemDescription.name: Baleen Type System - Geospatial
typeSystemDescription.description:
XML definition of the Baleen geospatial type system.
This XML file classified as UK OFFICIAL.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.geo.Coordinate
typeDescription.description: A well-formed coordinate value - MGRS or WGS84 DD or DMS cooridate system - explictly defined in source document.

featureDescription.name: coordinateValue
featureDescription.description: A normalised value for the coordinate.
